channel.title: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
channel.description: Qwerty I Know U Could Probably Do It So Help :), If Anyone Else Knows, Please Help Me.

item.title: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
item.dc:creator: @Pro_Killer Pro Killer
item.description:
@Pro_Killer wrote:

Oh Btw Only Javas Work But When I Add It It Picks Flax When I Click ‘Use bank’

Heres His Code Again:

case 2646: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You pick some flax"); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(134); addItem(1779, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

I Dont Know Why It Happens.

Read full topic

@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Try this one:

case 2646: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You pick some flax"); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(134); addItem(1779, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

item.title: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Actually, it would be:

case 2646: sendMessage("You pick the flax."); addItem(flaxID, 1); setAnimation(134); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

You were right, I knew.

Read full topic

item.title: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
item.dc:creator: @Pro_Killer Pro Killer
item.description:
@Pro_Killer wrote:

Done Done And Done…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 02:45:25 PM[/size][hr]This Is What It Looks Like:

[Code]case 2643:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
addSkillXP((8*playerLevel[12]), 12);
addItem(1806, 1);
sendMessage(“You make a pot.”);
setAnimation(0x378);
actionTimer = 15;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2646:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You pick some flax”);
actionName = “flax1”;
actionTimer = 30;
setAnimation(134);
addItem(1779, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2357:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You dig in the bushes”);
addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[19]), 19);
addItem(1968, 3);
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You manage to find some kind of seeds.”);
}
break;[/Code]

Read full topic

item.title: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

case ####:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You pick some flax");
actionName = "flax1";
actionTimer = 30;
setAnimation(####);
addItem(####, ####);
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

####'s are item id’s, emote id’s, and object id’s
the case number is the object id. For adding the item you put the item id in the first part, and the number in the second part.

Read full topic
item.source: Making It So When I Click Flax It Picks It
